content.question: The North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO) moved its headquarters in the 1960' s because

choices.label: de Gaulle wanted to build a French military policy independent of NATO
the Soviet Union became increasingly aggressive
Great Britain offered a base for NATO military operations
West Germany was already occupied by three Western powers
Adenauer wanted to strengthen the status of Bonn as the capital city of West Germany

content.answer: de Gaulle wanted to build a French military policy independent of NATO

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
